content: total round 6-7 *k1 p1 repeat from * around round 8 k2tog around 18 21 sts total round 9-10 knit around break yarn leaving a 4-6 tail slip all stitches onto the waste yarn and pull tight this should draw all the stitches together tightly together weave in your ends when weaving in your ends make sure to close the gap on the cast on edge and then you should be done with your adams hat i would love to see your finished hat make sure to tag me on instagram @woolenthusiast or add a project to the adams hat on ravelry if you have any questions please reach out to luke@thewoolenthusiast com
